title: Russian cabbage borscht
ingredients: ['225g thinly sliced potatoes', '140g thinly sliced beetroot', '1L vegetable stock or water', '2 tablespoons butter', '250g chopped onions', '1 teaspoon caraway seed (optional)', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 celery stick, chopped', '1 large carrot, sliced', '250g coarsely chopped red cabbage', 'black pepper to taste', '1/4 teaspoon fresh dill', '1 tablespoon cider vinegar', '1 tablespoon honey', '250ml passata', 'soured cream, for topping', 'chopped tomatoes, for garnish']
